name: Wigglytuff
description: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.effect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being infatuated.  Overworld: If the first Pokémon in the party has this ability, any wild Pokémon whose species can be either gender has a 2/3 chance of being set to the opposite gender, and a 1/3 chance of having a random gender as usual.

abilities.name: Competitive
abilities.effect: Raises Special Attack by two stages upon having any stat lowered.
abilities.description: Boosts the Sp. Atk stat when a stat is lowered.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it reveals an opposing Pokémon's held item to all participating trainers.  In a double battle, if one opponent has an item, this Pokémon will Frisk that Pokémon; if both have an item, it will Frisk one at random.
abilities.description: The Pokémon can check the foe’s held item.
